div.bibl: Onze Toekomst, Dec. 6, 1907. WAS CHRIST A HUMAN BEING?

body.p: A simple question: Nevertheless one of our inhabitants put the question to the well known evangelist, Dr. Torrey. The inquirer admitted that the question was often discussed in his family whether the Saviour really was a live moving human being, or if he was a ghost whom people could not feel.

Naturally, Dr. Torrey answered that Christ was a human being, "with the same emotions as ours, but without sin". But the incident makes a person doubtful, whether we are really living under the influence of the gospel.
